alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 3:18PM MST until December 23 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...El Paso, Crowley, and Kiowa counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM MST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of around an inch per hour along with strong northerly winds could lead to quick and significant reductions in visibility.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
